name: Database Development Environment
postCreateCommand: if ! command -v docker &> /dev/null; then sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y docker.io && sudo systemctl start docker && sudo systemctl enable docker; fi && git checkout main && git pull origin main && if ! command -v pip3 &> /dev/null; then sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y python3-pip; fi && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
